nodes.text: A proximity fuse was a type of fuse that could be used in a stun grenade to detonate the grenade if someone came in close proximity to it.

In about 12 ABY, the rogue Jedi Dal Konur installed a number of defences in a hangar bay in the Bilbringi Shipyards and he placed some stun grenades equipped with proximity fuses inside two turbolifts located near to the hangar.
